items.summary: Rewrite `backend/main.mo` to remove all `mo:core/*` imports and use only `mo:base/*` modules (and Motoko built-ins), so the backend compiles in production.

Replace all logic currently relying on `mo:core`-specific data structures/APIs in `backend/main.mo` with `mo:base` equivalents while preserving the existing public Candid interface and behavior for: user profiles, shop items CRUD, cart operations, UPI purchases, orders listing, and order approval.

Ensure backend state remains upgrade-safe after migrating away from `mo:core` data structures by implementing stable state serialization + reconstruction in the single `backend/main.mo` actor, initializing defaults when no prior state exists; add `backend/migration.mo` only if required to preserve existing deployed state.
